SageTVPlugin.Name: OSD Enhancements
SageTVPlugin.Description: Various enhancements for the OSD (time remaining and play toggle). - Adds the amount of time remaining to the OSD. The display will then indicate the time that has already played as well as the amount of time remaining to play. - Enables a toggle effect with the play button, so pressing play when the OSD is displayed will remove the OSD from the display.
